function.name: create_story_chapter_and_choices
function.description: Create a schema for a chapter to the story that consists of one chapter and multiple choices of how the story can continue. The chapter should be in the given topic and follow previous chapters and choices.

chapterText.description: 1-2 Paragraphs of the text for this chapter for the given topic. This is also a continuation, follow the previous chapter and choices in the prompt besides the topic.

chapterImagePrompt.description: For the given topic create a cover image prompt that dalle can use to generate the image and abide to the following policy: // 1. The prompt must be in English. Translate to English if needed. // 3. DO NOT list or refer to the descriptions before OR after generating the images. // 4. Do not create more than 1 image.

choiceText.description: A choice of 2-3 sentences of how the story should continue in the next chapter.
